component.name: SimpleRowListItem
component.script:
function itemContentChanged() as void itemData = m.top.itemContent m.itemImage.uri = itemData.posterUrl m.itemText.text = itemData.labelText end function
function init() as void print "Inside init" m.itemImage = m.top.findNode("itemImage") m.itemText = m.top.findNode("itemText") print "Leaving init" end function
